body.name: Aeitto® 32-Quart PRO Large Air Fryer Oven| Toaster Oven Combo | with Rotisserie, Dehydrator and Full Accessories | 19-In-1 Digital Airfryer | Fit 13" Pizza, 9pcs Toast, 1800w, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 12 mins
features: 😋【32QT/30L MAX Capacity for Family】4-level even cooking,fast & easily prepare meals for a family of 2-6. Fit in 13-inch pizza, 9 slices of toast, 5 lbs rotisserie chicken, 10 lbs roast turkey. Suitable for most 13 inch pans,12 cup muffin trays, and dutch oven up to 6QT.

【18+N Presets & 6 Machines Combo】One machine to fulfill air fry, bake, roast, broil, toast, dehydrate, rotisserie, defrost, warm, proof, and so on.Combine air Fryer, toaster, rotisserie, Dehydrator, pizza grill and convection oven in one machine, saving your countertop space.

【Fast & Even cooking, Less-oil, Crispy】The convection fan of air fryer generate 360°hot airflow produces crispier exterior and moist tender interior with less oil,providing you with perfect taste and healthy diet. The innovative dual cook function enables you to combine any two functions in preset. Make Complex recipes effortless and rich the dish's flavor.Double Glass door heat insulation reduces heat loss effectively reduces preheat time.

【6 Upgraded Accessories & Cookbook】Sufficient accessories for various meals: Upgraded enamel baking pan-easy to clean, fry basket, oven rack, rotisserie spit fork, rotisserie lift, and crumb tray. Come with a cookbook including 30 effortless recipes. All accessories are detachable and dishwasher safe.

【Aeitto Quality & Service & Warranty】ETL Certified. Aeitto offers 30 days money-back guarantee, 1-year warranty, and a lifetime technical consultation. If any problems, please feel free to contact us via amazon,problems will be solved within 24 working hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Five Stars. Fantastic!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough good things about this oven! First of all it is amazingly quiet. It's got every feature you could want - toast, air fry, roast, rotisserie, dehydrate, pizza, dual function, and a bunch more. You can turn off the button sounds. The menu has actual words, and is very easy to use. The touch control is sensitive. It is well insulated and doesn't put off a ton of heat. The handle doesn't get hot at all. It is large enough to have a really good capacity on the interior, but it's not too massive on the countertop. You CAN actually rotisserie roast a 4-5 lb chicken in it! I cooked one that was just under 5 lbs last night, and it was delicious. The manual that comes with it is detailed and easy to understand. It makes great toast. It's reasonably easy to clean. It works quickly and efficiently. I previously had one of the first generation air fryers - the one that they sold on the infomercials. I had lots of problems with it. This over is leaps and bounds above that one. I've never heard of this brand before, but whoever designed this thing really put a lot of thought and work into making it excellent. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great customer support
reviews.reviewText: I love this toaster oven/air fryer, and literally haven't needed to use my regular oven since receiving this one, which has been over seven months (and one Thanksgiving dinner) now. It has so many easy to use features, pre-heats quickly, and is very quiet. My kitchen stayed cooler this summer, not having to heat up my full-sized gas oven.But even better than the product itself, was my exerience with their customer support department. I had placed my small dutch oven, which is quite heavy, on the wire rack and it made it sort of sag in the middle. On hindsight I should have used the solid baking pan to better support the weight.I went to purchase a new replacement rack on Amazon but didn't find one, so then went to Aeitto's website to look for one, but again didn't find one. So as a last resort measure, I contacted Customer Support and explained my issue.They were very responsive and professional and within days I received a replacement wire rack. I couldn't be more pleased and would highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I loved this oven, but had to return it. It just wasn't wide enough for my pans to fit it. I am so disappointed that I had to return this oven. I was a great piece of machinery! Very quiet worked fantastict looked so beautiful but was just not big enough inside. It needs to be wider and taller. I was so sad to have to return it. I really neede this oven combo. I don't use electric ovens house due to them not working properly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s big, easy to use. Doesn’t make much noise. And it has cooked everything that I have put in it. I haven’t used the rotisserie yet, but I’m going to. It’s not hard to set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this oven for three months and absolutely love it! My husband and I air fry potatoes, roast veggies, bake fish filets and chicken breasts and proof breads and nut yogurts. It fits perfectly under our cabinets and doesn’t get that hot on the outer surface of the oven as the description warns, so that’s an added plus. I love the sleek design and super easy to use! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE my Aietto oven
reviews.reviewText: I need a larger air fryer oven for all cooking/baking (I don't have a standard oven). The actual inner oven size is large enough to use my 9 X 11 casserole dishes and to cook a 12" pizza (does GREAT pizza!). It heats up instantly, so no waiting. So far, this oven is easy to clean. I'm not sure if the innards are non-stick, but I just wipe off all parts after use and it's clean. Cooked 1/2 turkey for Thanksgiving , and it was the best we've had in years. It's sleek and not too big on the counter. If you want/need a larger air fryer oven, this one is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So glad I bought this. I use it almost daily. Large size, easy to operate, does everything I need it to do, including proofing bread dough. Definitely saves on electricity vs my conventional oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars not user friendly presets dont wirk out on anything
reviews.reviewText: open elements n broil setting are gonna result in a fire if you dont start one with the baking sheet, but its big enough to burn a large pizza or undercook some fries
